title: Cudahy Police Identified 2-year-old Murdered Victim As Skylar Monroe Hartman
content:
Cudahy, WI - On Saturday, Cudahy police identified the young victim in the murder-suicide investigation as Skylar Monroe Hartman, 2, who was fatally shot by her father, Brett Hartman, 27, on New Year's Day. Hartman than committed suicide by a self-inflicted gunshot wound, according to police.
Skylar and Hartman were found around 1:30 a.m. at a residence in Cudahy. Hartman had previously threatened that he would kill himself and his child, but never acted on it until Friday. Skylar was taken to a local hospital where she was later declared deceased, Hartman died at the scene.
